name: Fieldwork: Supplier Change Approval and SOD Audit
description: Audit workflow to evaluate the supplier change approval process and ensure proper Segregation of Duties (SOD) in vendor master file maintenance.

data.label: Analyze VMF Change Logs
data.description: Obtain and analyze the Vendor Master File (VMF) change logs for the audit period.
data.instructions:
1. Request a system-generated report of all additions, modifications, and deletions to the Vendor Master File.
2. Ensure the log includes user IDs, timestamps, and both 'before' and 'after' values for changed fields (especially banking details).
3. Filter for high-risk changes such as bank account updates or duplicate vendor names.

data.label: Evaluate SOD for VMF Maintenance
data.description: Identify and evaluate SOD conflicts within the vendor maintenance and payment process.
data.instructions:
1. Obtain a current User Access Listing (UAL) for the ERP/Accounting system.
2. Map permissions to identify users with the ability to both modify vendor records AND process invoices or initiate payments.
3. Review any automated SOD rules or system flags currently in place.

data.label: Sample Testing for Authorizations
data.description: Select a sample of changes to verify proper authorization and documentation.
data.instructions:
1. Select a statistically significant or judgmental sample of vendor changes from the logs obtained in Step 1.
2. For each sample, request the original change request form and supporting documentation (e.g., W-9, vendor-signed letters).
3. Verify that an authorized individual other than the requester approved the change.

data.label: Independent Verification Testing
data.description: Confirm that high-risk changes were verified through independent methods.
data.instructions:
1. Focus on the sample of banking information changes.
2. Verify that an out-of-band confirmation (e.g., a 'call-back' to a known contact at the vendor) was performed and documented.
3. Ensure the person performing the verification was independent of the VMF entry process.

data.label: Final Assessment and Reporting
data.description: Compile findings into a summary report of SOD gaps and authorization exceptions.
data.instructions:
1. Consolidate results from SOD analysis and sample testing.
2. Identify root causes for any unauthorized changes or control bypasses.
3. Draft recommendations for remediation, such as role-based access adjustments or improved verification protocols.
